# collinearityR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of collinearityR is to identify multicollinearity issues by correlation, VIF, and visualizations.

## Installation

You can install the released version of collinearityR from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("collinearityR")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("UBC-MDS/collinearityR_tool")
```
## Usage

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(collinearityR)
## basic example code
```
